website_summaries.verdict: A superior golf chipping net designed for use just about anywhere.
pros: Pyramid-shaped net designed to catch errant shots and help golfers improve short game accuracy
Can be set up or taken down quickly

customer_reviews.title: Chipping Net Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 21 year old son who chips daily in back yard. Took 30 seconds to set up. Directions were easy but you don't even need. Its easy to store away. Come with bag (zipper). We started having a chipping contest. A bargain for only $24.99. Highly rec!
customer_reviews.author: JGman

customer_reviews.title: Premium Quality, low price.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second GoSports golf product (10x7 hitting net) and I am very impressed with the quality of their products, especially for the price. There are many other options out there for double the cost, but I can’t imagine how they could be double the value. You won’t regret this purchase. Sets up in less than a minute, folding it up once you get the hang of it will take maybe a minute. This company makes simple to use, high quality intuitive products.
customer_reviews.author: danchise

customer_reviews.title: Really fun for rainy day practice indoors.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this thing. I use it indoors with whiffle golf balls. I suppose it helps my short game, but that is only part of it. It's just fun to use. Putting it back in the small bag that comes with it is not as easy as opening it up. I suggest that you follow the instructions, take your time and be careful when you fold it back into it's storage pouch. It will go in there, just don't try to force it.
customer_reviews.author: Magwitch

customer_reviews.title: Great backyard target
customer_reviews.text: Great target for chipping in backyard, Elastic straps have stretched out but can be tightened easily
customer_reviews.author: eddie

customer_reviews.title: Great Practice Net!
customer_reviews.text: This practice chipping net is a great tool to work on your game at home. I've found that the consistency of my chip shots on the course have definitely improved after working with the chipster net at home. It's a good deal for the price and super easy to set up and break down. Anyone looking to improve their short game would benefit from this product!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Chip away
customer_reviews.text: Need to be a good chipper to hit this target. Great for yard games and honing the chipping skills.
customer_reviews.author: jack schroyer

customer_reviews.title: simple but effective home trainer
customer_reviews.text: if you want some easy practice at home--this is a cool device to have. simple to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Wolgin

customer_reviews.title: Chipping practice at home
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for a way to practice chipping during the pandemic. It’s easy to set up to use. Very basic. What I expected for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: RJBD

customer_reviews.title: Great Practice Net
customer_reviews.text: Who would’ve thought there would be so many of these practice nets to choose from?! I’m really pleased with this one. We’ve had it for a little over a month. It has held up well with a lot of use from my husband and two young boys. We bought a pack of multi colored foam balls to play our own family golf game with the net and it has been fun! Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Miller

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Lightweight. Doesn't collapse when chipping into the multiple nets. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne

customer_reviews.title: Great chipping net
customer_reviews.text: Set it up in the garage and has worked well. Seems sturdy enough to last for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: KCGWest

customer_reviews.title: Practice practice practice
customer_reviews.text: Just what the doctor ordered to improve my short game
customer_reviews.author: Deldn

customer_reviews.title: Good gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband as a Christmas gift and he loves it! It comes in a little compact carrier so it makes storage easy.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Its decent but too flimsy imo...
customer_reviews.text: Its decent but too flimsy imo ... Product wont last long probb a couple months to a year at most
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Oh

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up and fun to use. Ability to play a variety of chipping games.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Segreve

customer_reviews.title: Very light weight
customer_reviews.text: Suggest adding a few ground spikes, similar to a tent, to secure to the ground since it is very light and gets blown over easily.
customer_reviews.author: Greg A

customer_reviews.title: Chipping
customer_reviews.text: Great for close chipping. Does what its supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Richard J. Peach

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Easy set up and take down. Great practice aid or game with the family!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great chipping/pitching practice aid
customer_reviews.text: Serves its purpose. Very light but very stable nonetheless. We love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Theodore A.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to set up/put back in bag. Works exactly as expected. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Matt M.

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Product works well, is lightweight and easy to set up. You can be chipping in minutes!
customer_reviews.author: Michael D.

customer_reviews.title: Good if it didn’t break
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift to my dad broke the second time he used it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Chipping Net Of Many I’ve Owned
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had several chipping nets and, for various reasons, just didn’t rate a 5. This one is a 5! It’s easy to assemble and quick to take down and store. I expect that to be more durable over more years. Very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: J. R. McBride

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Really good product was easy to set up and can use real or fake golf balls and will stay sturdy!!
customer_reviews.author: Abigail May

customer_reviews.title: Great backyard pastime
customer_reviews.text: Love the easy set up but do use a couple of wood dowels to support it at the corners. Had it since Christmas 2019 and have used it regularly. Has been in regular use since the virus shut down all the golf chipping and putting areas. Got the Sklz>> putting green for in the house and it's great too.
customer_reviews.author: DaHaus12

product_meta.title: GoSports Chipster Golf Chipping Pop Up Practice Net | Indoor Outdoor Short Game Training
product_meta.description: The Chipster was designed by GoSports to provide a compact and versatile training aid that will help improve your chipping and shave strokes off your round. Our unique target system allows you to focus on a specific landing area for both lob shots or lower chip and run shots. The Chipster can be setup and put away in seconds making it a must have training tool for golfers of all abilities. Whether you or a friend is looking to improve their golf game, the Chipster is a great place to start! The Chipster is backed by a full lifetime and our GoSports customer service team based in sunny Southern California is available M-F (we golf on the weekends) to help with any issues.
feature_bullets: IMPROVE YOUR SHORT GAME: Whether you or a friend is looking to improve their golf game, the Chipster is a great place to start
USE ANYWHERE: Compact pop-up net can be used in backyards, parks, on the course and more
DYNAMIC TARGETS: Pyramid design allows players to refine their aim with most errant shots being caught by the side net
INSTANT SETUP: Setup and Takedown the Chipster in Seconds
